channel.title: art on particl3s.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in art on particl3s.xyz

item.title: Suzume No Tojiwari
item.description: Currently the movie so aptly named Suzume No Tojiwari is playing in my whereabouts and I had the fortune to view it in a theatre. To my thoughts it was going to be only a few people, anime weebs with asthma and myself. As it turns out the venue was packed and in hindsight all the better for it. It was funny, heartwarming, depressing and much, much more. If you get a chance to see it on a large screen it gets thumbs up for any anime fan.

item.title: Another Cowl
item.description: Infinity Wars the Card Game had another successful kickstarter. To learn more about its revival visit Link in post.

item.title: Ēostre
item.description: Slumber.

item.title: Yule time
item.description: Pass the pudding please, never get enough of sourdough rye in the wool. Holden bottleneck swept up by the wear sunscreen.

item.title: Hangar
item.description: Saw some squeegy kids cleaning windows in a place, an apartment complex on a visit to the city. Living on the outskirts makes a world of difference, remembering the night life and how different it is to be awake without sun for years.

item.title: 毒薬
item.description: Easy fallen vertigo; virtuous blight, but not without temper that once stood so still.

item.title: Phonograph
item.description: All’s turpentine, black as soot. Sombre bellows sirens speaks, from birch to birch then again.

item.title: Chokeberries & Acorns
item.description: Gonna work towards scripts and storyboards to wittle down time, efficiency and pipeline.

item.title: End of Summer
item.description: Time to be a cake-a-holic, can’t wait for cheese cake during winter. The trees have started turning colour and a bunch are still growing berries.

item.title: Chromarinara
item.description: Chroma Corps 2022 has started –> Link

item.title: Candles
item.description: Since electric outages are starting to happen there’s a bunch of candles about the house here. First world problems, getting supplies and stuff.

item.title: Gingerbread Fingers
item.description: Took a walk through a forest, saw almost no one. Scrounging about town for bakeries and dessert.

item.title: The Earth Blushes in Flowers
item.description: Flower was an awesome video game.

item.title: Wear Sun Screen!
item.description: Since Summer is about to begin the ceremony is in. It’ll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, city streets are best not get isolated in.

item.title: Onion Skins Have Pigment
item.description: The machinery has been overheating a lot, good thing there’s an internal thermometer. It usually taps out at around 70 degrees celsius. Let’s paint some eggs!

item.title: Chlorophyll
item.description: Attempted homemade nutella with peanuts, cocoa powder and honey once. Bad idea, thumbs up for culinary disasters.

item.title: Seasons
item.description: Waking up to a foot of snow, untouched without visitors in the night. The end of winter is bitter and sweet since the animals are about and cold blistering hollow no more.
Happy New Year!

item.title: Acme
item.description: Comments have been removed on account of making website ugly.

item.title: Reference
item.description: From now on this here subset in recess has dedication outlined to keeping up to date on personal projects, w.i.ps and so on.

item.title: Site is Live!
